parameters.name: FastenerType
parameters.description: Fastener type as defined in swWzdHoleStandardFastenerTypes_e

title: IWizardHoleFeatureData2.ChangeStandard
description: Sets the standard for all of the parameters of the Hole Wizard feature that are driven by the database.
signature:
System.Boolean ChangeStandard( 
   System.Int32
Standard
,
   System.Int32
FastenerType
,
   System.String
SSize
)

parameters.name: FastenerType
parameters.description: Fastener type as defined in swWzdHoleStandardFastenerTypes_e

returns: True if the standard is changed, false if not
remarks:
Use this method to change
fastener size
,
fastener type
, and
design standard
of a Hole Wizard feature.
If changing the standard requires you to change the type, then you must call
IWizardHoleFeatureData2::Type
before calling IWizardHoleFeatureData2::ChangeStandard.
